name: The Cat's Gift
description:
A mysterious cat has a few gifts to brighten up your dark night, if you can keep up with her.

InputActionWSAD keys
MoveSpace key
JumpMouse move
LookEsc key
Quit

An exercise in 3D development with Godot, animation with Blender, and level building with Trenchbroom.

  • Models
    • Polly - Low Poly Anime Character
    • Cat Rigged
  • Textures
    • Realistic Low Resolution Texture Pack (Quake/Simulant Compatible)
  • Sounds
    • https://soundeffect-lab.info
    • Purring Cat
  • Addons
    • Qodot
    • Third-Person Controller by Sombresonge
    • DecalCo
